title: Catching a Serial Killer: Bruce McArthur

sources.title: Catching A Serial Killer | Full Crime Drama Movie | Rotten Fruit
sources.description:
Detective Paul Wolfs is an older cop and one week before his retirement it seems he has caught alleged serial killer Robert Clarck. The evidence is overwhelming and a confession would be the icing on the cake of his career.
2021.  Stars: Stefan Vancraeynest, Rufus Six, Michele Rocco Smeets

metadata.Plot: Bruce McArthur was many things: friend, grandfather, mall Santa, landscaper - and a ruthless serial killer. He lived a double life: his wholesome appearance and cooperative nature eluded cops for years while he engaged in a hedonistic lifestyle filled with violent sex that often went too far. He cunningly took advantage of his work as a gardener and buried his victims' body parts in the yards of his posh clientele. "Catching a Serial Killer: Bruce McArthur" unravels the twists and turns of the shocking investigation into Toronto's most prolific serial killer. Through exclusive interviews with McArthur's close friends and the homicide investigators who cracked the case and expert analyses by leading criminologists and forensic psychologists, this two-hour special uncovers how McArthur targeted, terrorized and murdered members of Toronto's LGBTQ+ community, The Village, for nearly a decade before getting caught.
metadata.Actors: David Dickinson, Wendy Gillis, Hank Idsinga
